========
Modeling
========


Approaches
==========

Linear Regression Model is build at for three themes - Low Carb, Chicken, Salmon
To find the sales driver for our vendor A - theme chosen has high market share as well as good growth

Experimentations
================

1. Sale Unit A - Dependent variable
2. High correlated variables were removed
3. Units were removed because of causality and only average price was taken
4. Backward elimination
5. Different Latency for Search & Social
6. Monthly & Weekly data prepared

Interpretations
---------------

1. Weekly level sales data is better
2. Highest correlated latency taken

Results & comparisons
---------------------
1. Own Price is an important factor
2. Search and Social post can be increase to increase sales
3. Product awareness
